welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kew Green, a charming and picturesque town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its beautiful gardens and historical landmarks. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of long-haul and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Private Jet Center
terminals.description: Dedicated terminal for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a dedicated terminal for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly EasyJet, British Airways, and Virgin Atlantic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly Ryanair, TUI Airways, and Norwegian Air Shuttle flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to high-end travelers and private jet owners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
